API Ref stats.py¶

Author: Norland Raphael Hagen <norlandrhagen@gmail.com> Date: 07-23-2021

cmapdata - stats - cmap summary stats functionallity.

ingest.stats.aggregate_large_stats(branch, tableName, server)¶

aggregates summary stats files and computes stats of stats. Returns stats dataframe

ingest.stats.buildLarge_Stats(df, datetime_slice, tableName, branch, transfer_flag='dropbox')¶

Input is dataframe slice (daily, 8 day, monthly etc.) of a dataset that is split into multiple files

ingest.stats.build_stats_df_from_db_calls(tableName, server)¶

Builds basic (min,max,count) summary stats from existing table in DB

Parameters

  • tableName (string) – CMAP table name

  • Server (string) – Valid CMAP server name
